title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: Guest Speakers
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Guest Speakers                Guest Speakers         A Mount Rushmore ranger visiting a local classroom. NPS photo.  Mount Rushmore Rangers In The Classroom All programs are based on South Dakota and national curriculum standards   All programs are free   Programs are available to schools within a 40-mile radius of the park   To request a ranger program, please fill out the reservation form below and submit by fax or email. Please contact us with any questions concerning our classroom programs.  2016 Education Newsletter (727 KB PDF) 2016 Rangers in the Classroom Application (91 KB PDF) Tips for filling out the reservation form:  Save the pdf form to your computer Fill it out electronically and save your work Attach the completed form to an email or Print and fax the completed form
